questions.content: Do you produce products or only trade them?
Do you physically possess these products?
Are you a primary producer (meaning you use timber coming directly from the forest?
Does/would your entire production use FSC materials (as opposite to only part of the production set for FSC and other part not)?
answers: Yes, my entire production is/will focus on FSC material

questions.content: Do/would you only sell your products with one of the FSC claims that you have used as your input, or do/would you calculate your output claims differently?
answers: I only sell (would sell) products with one of the claims that I have used as your input

I (would) either calculate a percentage claim that corresponds to the proportion of claim-contributing inputs, or chose a proportion of outputs to be sold with a credit claim corresponding to the quantity of claim-contributing inputs
